column4: Hi to all. I have a problem with jack (audio connection kit). I  have just installed it on my kubuntu 8.04. This is the log of the terminal: http://paste.ubuntu.com/18660/
you have to disable PulseAudio before using jack
how can i disable pulse audio in kubuntu?
I din't know you have kubuntu. What's the output of "jackd -R -d alsa -d hw:0"?
